description:
Senpai awakens in another world, where he and Nekotoro set out on an adventure to defeat the demon king. Nagatoro invites Senpai to the beach.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Senpai, Choro Sugiruu / Senpai! Umi, Ikimashouu!
T`es grave naïf / Ramène-toi à la plage !
You`re a Wimp, Senpai / Senpai! Let`s Go to the Beach!!
センパイ, ちょろ過ぎる~♥ / センパイ! 海, 行きましょうー!
